TopicTitle: The Procrastinaut Space Program: Official discussion thread

Articles.Content:
Welcome fellow Procrastinaut's to our own little place on the KSP forums! Here you can find all the information regarding my lets play series, Including the BREAKING GROUND EXPANSION RELEASE STREAM!!!! For those of you just seeing this for the first time (and wondering what the hell this is all about), why not check out the entire kerbal playlist:

CURRENT EPISODE:

CURRENT OBJECTIVE: Breaking ground expansion release stream

TIME: 8pm GMT (12pm CST)

DATE: 30th may 2019

Please feel free to post any comments, criticisms or suggestions below  I understand I have been away from the youtube game a while but would love to see old and new people come check me out during the stream.

Peace!!

Pleborian - Chief Procrastinaut

(quick note to forum staff, I understand that I have necro'd a VERY old thread however this felt like the correct thing to do as a new thread would just be a dupe, that and i forgot how to link videos with the forum codes)

Edited May 30, 2019 by Pleborian
Updating with new stuff

PLEBORIANS MISSION CATALOGUE;

removed old content to make way for newer stuff

Edited May 30, 2019 by Pleborian
Updating with new stuff

Hey pleborian great videos cant wait for .17 myself but talking about that how do i check on all the updates because the update forum i use doesnt tell me anything about the new planets and i just cant find it.

well there are a couple of places, first off go to the KSP development thread where there is a topic telling us what is going to be in the next update... secondly im not sure what forum your using but this one right here is the official one, and although it takes some digging around you can find posts by the devs with good bits of info and piccys. another good place is the dev blogs that are always to the right of the screen when on the main forum page
Let me start off with your videos rock. You are the one that made me purchase this game and I thank you. Keep up with the hard work and great videos.
love your channel buddy, keep up the good work.

I would like to notify you (Unless you already know) about that docking mod.

I sent you a mesage on YouTube by the way about it.
Keep up the awesome work Pleborian! You're AWESOME!

Keep up the awesome work Pleborian! You're AWESOME!

I can confirm that he is indeed awesome.
ha! I love your videos. That was a great rescue. can I see the rest of the mission yet?

ha! I love your videos. That was a great rescue. can I see the rest of the mission yet?

tadaaa, its uploaded for your viewing pleasure these will go up all the way till friday (probably around the same time too)
hey pleb, I created a couger transporter, if you like I can modify her into a spaceplane
new episode up

Last part of the Apollo MEM was uploaded.

0.17 videos now!
0.17 Please

New episode with Duna mission is up.

Left me with a cliffhanger though

at some point next week:

at some point next week:

OHMERGERD, that's beast
Damn, thats one sexy ship.

You Sir, have inspired me to keep working at it when everything fails. I enjoy watching your videos (The Procrastinaut Space Program, Project Zomboid and FTL) and learn a lot from them. During your mission set with the Kerpollo/Apollo theme it has inspired me to make my own now that .17 has come out. Can you explain the Kethane mod you used earlier in the series, I have seen it and read all about it but really don't understand how it is used or functions.

Thanks for taking the time to show us your missions and ships, and keep on pushing missions and ideas out.
i love your videos Pleborian keep up the good work
new episode up guys, as well as the legacy mk II and the kerpollo IMEM
Yea, great videos man.
Been watching your KSP videos since the first one. Great videos. I quite enjoy your uploading schedule, You don't make 1 video every 2 months like some people do....
its not always that simple though, like last week I didnt get an upload in from tuesday to monday. but I do try to get as many as I can out there for you guys
